title: Assassins can't kill Vayne
body:
Assassins can barely get on top of Vayne and if they manage to do so they will be condemned into a wall and instantly killed. Also the fact that her ult's duration is increased whenever she kills someone is absurd. How can I kill someone in a teamfight if most of the time they are invisible? Also one Vayne Q deals half of my health as a squishy champion. 

Assassins have delayed burst. Vayne doesn't.
Assassins need to hit skillshots. Vayne doesn't. 
Assassins can't kill tanks. Vayne can.
Assassins aren't good at teamfighting. Vayne is.

A champion so good should be able to be taken down. Make her E a skillshot so assassins can use their mobility to get on top of her, and increase the cooldown on her Q so she doesn't burst harder than an assassin. Any assassin should be able to kill her no matter at which point of the game.

Personally I think if they gave the burst back to assassins then the whole ADC being op thing would be over with. I main ADC and I think that ADC's should be rewarded for positioning right and for watching where the enemy is (by being able to actually do a shit ton of damage) but should be punished if they misposition or if they aren't watching where the enemy assassin is. Vayne's secondary *is* assassin and to be fair she is made to 1v1, which is also why she has no extra range/aoe. But I think giving assassins back the burst is one of the best things Riot could do.

Not only would it be over for ADCs, it'd be over for every non-assassin.

Literally the only people who like assassin metas are assassins. ADCs hate it because they never get the ***chance*** to do anything in a fight, mages hate it because they're dead as soon as their CC wears off, divers...either hate it because they're outclassed by assassins (if assassins are buffed to create the meta), or are loving it because they *are* assassins (because they've gone with straight assassin items, because items have been buffed). Tank mains hate it because they get flamed if they ever go anything else, and because people are playing their mains like shit. Enchanters hate it because their shields, heals, and buffs mean jack shit when assassins burst *past* it, completely ignoring their entire kits...

Assassins as an overall *class* are fine. There are certain *cases* which need work (LeBlanc being a potato, while a few assassins just wipe entire teams. General issue is armor and MR are too low on *everyone* but tanks), but the *class* is fine. Delayed burst allows squishies to actually react. Before that, the ADC/enchanter was dead the second a Zed/Talon/Kat walked onto their screen, unless they were just so far ahead of the assassin that they could just face-tank their burst. Now, they actually get a chance to do things.

Hmm. It's almost as if ***you're not meant to win a 1v2***!.

It's a fascinating and new concept, but *supports are actually champions* now, meaning that, if you're facing their support and their ADC together, it's not a 1v1, but a 1v2!

It's a very new concept, true, so it may take some getting used to. I wish you luck in memorizing this, so that it may let you win your matches!
We are not asking to survive a 2v1 just kill the squishiest person on the team before we die in said 2 v 1.

Except the purpose of one of those 2 isn't to kill you, but to *prevent you from killing someone*.

If it was the ADC and their mid, that'd be a different story. Although you might end up dying, odds are you're going to kill one of them *if you dodge their CC*. But the Janna/Lulu/Soraka exists for the sole purpose of making sure that the ADC (or anyone else) doesn't die.

Also, part of the problem is that most assassins see the support blow their kit on their ADC, and neither back off to wait for it to expire, nor do they swap targets, and nuke the now-defenseless support.

Most assassins need to commit to the target. Zed for example can't ult the ADC say "weelp Lulu ulted and shielded Ashe better try for lulu now." It is "well Ashe just got any extra 1000 HP  after I dumped my full kit inter her. Guess I get to die now." The support can be purely reactive if their shields had a delay to cast it would even out.

Some of the points here are legit while others are totally wrong...

>Assassins have delayed burst. Vayne doesn't.
>Assassins need to hit skillshots. Vayne doesn't.
>Assassins can't kill tanks. Vayne can.
>Assassins aren't good at teamfighting. Vayne is.

This is true. But the problem is caused by her ult AD steroid and the statik+ RFF + IE combo. One is already massively nerfed. The when the other gets nerfed she won't have this insane burst.

>Make her E a skillshot so assassins can use their mobility to get on top of her

Awful change. Vayne is sh1t most of the time in most metas(will likely be so after the massive nerfs she got). Reliability is needed for an ADC that provides literally nothing but damage. 
 
>and increase the cooldown on her Q so she doesn't burst harder than an assassin

This is not what causes the burst. Ult AD + statik + RFF + IE is the vast majority of the burst.

>Any assassin should be able to kill her no matter at which point of the game

Nope, vayne's strength is in kiting and dueling. The outcome of vayne vs assassin should be a skill match up. This is something that almost no other ADC can do. But in having this she is also worse than other ADCs in many other aspects --- no long range spells, no utilities whatsoever, no AOE damage/farming capability.

Vayne deserved nerfs and she got them. Asking for more unreasonable nerfs is just wrong.

Unfortunately Vayne always did this. She always out bursted Assassins and out dueled them since day one. She was never a tank buster, she always was the prime mega 1v1 duelist that made Jax cry. Nasus was the only one who can beat her 1v1 with his wither. However since his wither range got nerfed he can not touch her in 5v5 team fights. So even if you finally find the upper hand on her 1v1 she can transition so well into team fights. This was always the case since season 3 with the BORK changes and the item being buffed for her.

His last match against Vayne was where she was 41/9/9 - no wonder he lost. Thus, this is a vent post. He was 14/11/17. OP never built a single armor item either.

Vayne requires to be close to melee range - a range where CC and skillshots are very landable in a teamfight. With the amount of CC in a game, she's easy to catch out. She also is weak in coordinated teams and his team lacked this strongly compared to theirs.

Her Q doesn't burst by the way. There's actually no damage since it's additive damage which doesn't crit. Her tumble is mainly for kiting. 
The sole purpose of Vayne is to be hard to catch - "Fighting against me is like boxing with shadows".

She just got a nerf BTW, so we'll need to see how she does first. 

Assassins shouldn't kill tanks - they're not ADCs.

Assassins aren't meant for teamfighting - they're not ADCs. They're meant to get in and out of the chaos of teamfights - assassination. Picking those out of position.

Assassins need skillshots - they're not the marksmen role.
Assassins have delayed burst - many ADCs have the same amount of burst as Vayne and worse.

You're naming ADC traits and associating them solely to strengths of Vayne when all ADCs are like this. Twitch has a much higher DPS and burst potential than Vayne. Tristana offers the same kind of burst but with more safety. Notice, they are all good at teamfighting, killing tanks, and do not have delayed burst when they gain critical strike items. 

Any assassin shouldn't be able to kill an ADC at any point of the game - else why should an ADC position/kite/receive peel.

This post seems composed more out of irritation than analytical suggestion.

If you're being bursted as an assassin, armor items are always there or damage reduction items. Just like ADCs are squishy, assassins are too due to the amount of damage their kits can create with just two items. An {{item:3031}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3147}} {{item:3142}}  easily offers no reaction time for an ADC to live through a single combo or an AA without significant armor. The same thing with assassins if they lack an armor item. If they cannot at least get randuins, GA, or defensive item to itemize against an ADC, why shouldn't you be punished.

> A champion so good should be able to be taken down. Make her E a skillshot so assassins can use their mobility to get on top of her, and increase the cooldown on her Q so she doesn't burst harder than an assassin. Any assassin should be able to kill her no matter at which point of the game.

Also, make any AA empowered by Tumble unable to crit, period. Not just the bonus damage from tumble, but all the damage from the tumble empowered AA. That way if Vayne players want to build crit, they have to stand there and turret - Tumbling will reduce their damage.

That Q change would be great. That way assassins would be able to kill her without getting bursted. If she doesn't use her dash/stealth assassins can combo her and kill her. If she uses her Q assassins will have a hard time killing her but they don't get bursted. Either way this change would favor assassins and that's the way it should be. ADCs should fear assassins.
